name: integrable
content:
integrable adjective
(IN MATHEMATICS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
mathematics
  specialized If a function or equation is integrable, it is possible to calculate its integral: Each of the distributions is integrable. The course was concerned with solving integrable differential equations.
More examplesFewer examplesThe energy balance gives a readily integrable form to the equation of motion.Note that P is integrable and its value is always positive.Let us assume that Fi is an integrable function.

integrable adjective
(FLEXIBLE)
able to be combined with other things in an effective way: The software package is highly customizable and integrable with many other products. We have managed to develop a fast, practical, and highly integrable device.
